headline: Franklin Resources, Inc. to Announce Second Quarter Results on May 2, 2025
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., April 04, 2025--On Friday, May 2, 2025 at approximately 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time, Franklin Resources, Inc. (the "Company") [NYSE:BEN] will release its second quarter operating results. A written commentary on the results will also be available via investors.franklinresources.com at approximately 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time.

headline: Franklin's March AUM Balance Declines Sequentially on Net Outflows
summary: BEN's March AUM balance falls 2.4% sequentially on net outflows and negative markets.
